prayer.title: üïäÔ∏è Morning Prayer
prayer.modeh_ani: ◊û◊ï◊ì◊î ◊ê◊†◊ô ◊ú◊§◊†◊ô◊ö ‚Äî I gratefully thank You, living and eternal King, for returning my soul within me with compassion.
prayer.blessing: Blessed are You who raises the lowly ‚Äî lift me to accomplish Your purposes.
prayer.psalm: Psalm 1:3: "He is like a tree planted by streams of water, yielding fruit in season."
prayer.proverb: Proverbs 16:3: "Commit your work to the Lord, and your plans will be established."
prayer.intention: Let my work today compound into something that outlasts me.
prayer.closing: Baruch atah Adonai ‚Äî Blessed are You, Lord, who renews creation daily with goodness.
